      • processCommand

        public boolean processCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                              String[] pars)
        Processes parameters into commands being executed. This follows priority. If two commands have the same command or alias priority takes over. If a command's command name and another commands alias match, the command with the actual command name is preferred even if the priority of the alias is higher.
        Parameters:
        sender - the command sender
        pars - the parameters
        Returns:
        true if a command was fired. False otherwise

      • getActiveCommands
